aliases.title: Aliases
aliases.description: Custom label:id pairs that let you reference users by your own identifiers (e.g., crm_user_id, database_id). An External ID must be set before aliases can be used.

push.title: Push Subscription
push.description: The push subscription for this device. Enables push notifications, in-app messages, and Live Activities (iOS only).

emails.title: Email Subscriptions
emails.description: Email addresses associated with this user for transactional and marketing email messaging.

sms.title: SMS Subscriptions
sms.description: Phone numbers (in E.164 format) associated with this user for SMS and RCS messaging.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Key-value string pairs attached to the user for segmentation and message personalization. Use tags for user properties like name, status, or preferences.

triggers.title: Triggers
triggers.description: Device-local key-value pairs that control when in-app messages are displayed. Triggers are not tags and are not sent to the server.

outcomes.title: Outcomes
outcomes.description: Track user actions (count, value, or unique) attributed to push notifications to measure campaign impact.

inAppMessaging.title: In-App Messaging
inAppMessaging.description: Display targeted messages inside your app based on segments and triggers. Shown to all mobile subscriptions regardless of push opt-in status.

location.title: Location
location.description: Share device location (requires user permission) for location-based segmentation and messaging.

trackEvent.title: Track Event
trackEvent.description: Send custom events with optional properties to trigger Journeys, activate Wait Until steps, and power real-time personalized messaging.

sendPushNotification.title: Send Push Notification
sendPushNotification.description: Test push notifications by sending them to this device.

options.name: Simple
options.description: Basic push notification with title and body text only.

options.name: With Image
options.description: Push notification with a large image attachment (big picture style).

options.name: Custom
options.description: Create a custom notification with your own title and message content.

sendInAppMessage.title: Send In-App Message
sendInAppMessage.description: Test in-app message display formats. These trigger local IAMs for testing UI layouts.

options.name: Top Banner
options.description: Slides in from the top of the screen. Best for non-intrusive alerts and quick info.

options.name: Bottom Banner
options.description: Slides in from the bottom of the screen. Great for prompts and soft CTAs.

options.name: Center Modal
options.description: Centered popup dialog. Ideal for important announcements requiring user attention.

options.name: Full Screen
options.description: Takes over the entire screen. Best for onboarding, promotions, or rich media content.
